page.title: 12Education
page.content:
The four Primary Schools where children attend until they are 11 years old are:-
{CHERRY TREE P.S.},Hardy Lane, with 150 pupils,5 teachers and headteacher Mrs.P.Hatfield. {OUGHTRINGTON P.S.}Howard Ave.,with around 220 pupils,7 teachers and headteacher, Mr.A.A.J.Van Suchtelen. {RAVENBANK P.S.}Pepper St., with 270 pupils,9 teachers and MrJ.I.Roberts. {STATHAM P.S.}Warrington Rd.,with 160 pupils,5 teachers and Mrs.P.M.Westwell as headteacher. The two high schools,{Lymm County High and{Oughtrington County High}are amalgamating in September 1985. The new{Lymm High School}will be a 1500 pupil, 11-18 comprehensive with 80 teachers and Mr.A. Watkins as headteacher.
